message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $13,500. This is a special offer considering its value to you is $12,000. Please let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $13,500 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm happy to pay $12,500 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept your offer of $12,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given the value you place on it.
